entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Haven't found the My Mac from the list of Debug target in curl braces #22471
  • [iOS] RecalculateSpanPositions causing crash #22469
  • CarouselView behaves strangely when manipulating position in ViewModel #22468
  • CollectionView SelectedItem loses Background after opening and closing a Modal page #22467
  • Maui usage of Glide is preventing us from using our own model loaders #22465
  • Has anyone done a human body keypoint test? #22464
  • Problema para acompanhar o tutorial da Microsoft de Aplicativo NetMaui!!!! #22462
  • OnPlatform control of type x:Double is not accessible as font size #22461
  • WebView hosting PDF still can't scroll when using the scrollbars on Catalyst #22460
    .NET 8 SR6
  • TabbedPage inside Grid works in debug mode, but throws exception in release mode (Copy of #16326) #22457
  • Extend MauiMaterialButton to expose a constructor which accepts a style id override #22455
  • ios Shell #22452
  • Change the element's width at runtime doesn't update quickly in Mac and iOS platforms #22451
  • Custom shell back button is always white in colour. #22450
  • Error when running MyFirstMauiApp saying "Optimizing assemblies for size failed" in vscode. #22449
  • Publish Windows, AppStore Bundle (.msixupload) missing #22445
  • Tabs on TabbedPage gone after popping Modal in background #22444
  • App Crash on Android due to ScrollViewHandler.DisconnectHandler call during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page. #22443
  • Click event fired even when button has views on top of it #22442
  • Button out of sight not clickable when translated #22439
  • Android view is flickering when add it to WindowManager with blur mode #22438

Closed

  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21411
    .NET 8 SR6
  • FlyoutHeader on iOS does not change its size after adding new content #20696
    Backlog
  • WebView in MAUI project doesn't scroll when has a PDF file loaded #21346
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] WebView rendering error on Android platform #22440
  • Crash App when change ControlTemplate and click item in Android App MAUI #22229
  • The app is crashing after sent to background IOS only #21533
  • Strange behavior on MAUI WebAuthenticator for android #22296
  • @ontouchstart:stopPropagation | @ontouchstart:preventDefault in iOS is not working. #21699

PullRequests

Created

  • Eilon/net8 blazor androidhang #22473
    area-blazor
  • [arcade] Apps need to use ApplicationDisplayVersion for the version #22472
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 bring arcade #22463
    area-infrastructure
  • [XC] Fix LogWarningOrError #22454
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447

Merged

  • Update to correct ExcludeMicrosoftNetTestSdk #22459
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Remove duplicate tests from LayoutTests #22456
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview4] Update release versions for net9 preview4 #22446
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix arcade warnings and update versions #22428
    area-infrastructure
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area-templates

Updated

  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • enable css for StackBase, remove for StackLayout #22419
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update to net9 preview5 #22399
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-templates, area-controls-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
